You are given a number in form of integer consist of digits from 0 to 9. Each digit consist of several dash ( see figure) . Your job is to calculate the number of dashes in the given number.
 
       --    --            -- 
   |     |      |   |   |   |   
   |     |      |   |   |   |   
       --    --    --     -- 
   |  |         |      |       |
   |  |         |      |       |
       --    --           -- 

 ---   ---    ---     ---     --- 
|          |   |    |   |    |   |     |
|          |   |    |   |    |   |     |
|          |   |    |   |    |   |     |
 ---           ---     ---       
|   |      |   |    |        |   |     |
|   |      |   |    |        |   |     |
|   |      |   |    |        |   |     |
 ---           ---     ---     ---

Note: 1 consists of 4 dashes, 2 consists of 10 dashes, 3 consists of 10 dashes, 4 consists of 8 dashes, 5 consists of 10 dashes, 6 consists of 18 dashes, 7 consists of 9 dashes, 8 consists of 21 dashes, 9 consists of 18 dashes, 0 consists of 18 dashes.



Input
Input will begin with an integer T, the number of test cases. Then there are T lines, each containing exactly one number N .
1 ≤ T ≤ 50


Output
For every number N , output a single line containing total number of dashes in that number.


Example

Input:
4
1
22
3430943
3490394

Output:
4
20
82
90
